みなさん！ 高度をとってユリアを先頭とした楔壱型に編隊してください！: Everyone! Take altitude and form a wedge Type One with Julia in the lead!
シリウスシュガーがどんな策を用意してるか知らないけど、先に叩けば関係ない！: I don't know what kind of plan Sirius Sugaru has in mind, but it doesn't matter if I hit him first!
高空からのサーチアンドデストロイで一気に終わらせちゃうよ！: Search and Destroy from high above will finish it all in one go!
七彩ちゃん、カオスメイデンが動いたよ。高度をとって飛行してくる。一気に接近中。: Shichika, Chaos Maiden's moving. She's flying at an altitude. It's closing in on her all at once.
いつでも撃ってこいってこと？完っ全に舐められてるってことじゃん！: You want me to shoot you anytime? You mean you're totally underestimating me!
……でも、撃てばこちらの居場所がバレる。: ...But if I shoot, they'll find out where I am.
このまま身を隠していても、状況は変わりません。ビル群を利用したファイア・アンド・: Even if we stay hidden, the situation won't change. We'll go with Fire and Move, using the cluster of buildings.
各機、遮蔽物に身を隠しつつ、上空の敵機への火力投射と移動！反撃を喰らわないよう注: All units, hide behind cover and firepower projectiles and move to enemy aircraft in the sky! Please be careful not to take any counterattacks!
――おっ、撃ってきた。判断が早くていい感じだね～。: ――Oh, he's shooting. He's quick on the uptake.
各機、急降下からの高機動格闘戦へ移行してください！: All units, please switch from steep descents to high-mobility combat!
ひとり一機撃破がノルマってことで！ よろしくー！: It's my job to take out each and every one of them! Nice to meet you!
ふふ、ここでもしいきなりあたしが敵に寝返ったら、みんなどんな反応する？: Hehe, if I suddenly switched sides with the enemy here, how would everyone react?
アニス、こんなときに試し行為はやめてください。: Ennis, please stop trying at a time like this.
ふふっ……ふふふふ！ たぎってきました……！戦いの始まりですね！: Heheh... Heheheheh! It's finally here! The battle is about to begin!
沙耶のスイッチが……一応言っておきますけど、いざってときはちゃんと私の指示に従っ: Saya's switch... Just in case, please follow my instructions when push comes to shove!
敵機接近！ 近接格闘戦に持ち込むつもりだね！: Enemy aircraft approaching! They're planning to engage in close-quarters combat!
来ましたわね……作戦通り、各機はビル群を利用して一度引いて距離をとってください。: They're here... Just as planned, please use the cluster of buildings to draw back and keep your distance.
ちゆるさんは援護射撃をお願いしますわ。: Chiyuru-san, I'm counting on you to cover me.
任せて。みんなの背中はあたしが守ってあげる。: Leave it to me. I'll protect everyone's backs.
それじゃ……全力で逃げちゃえ～！: Then... run away with all your might!
ちょっ……そっちから撃っておいて逃げるの！？すぐにやられちゃうとカッコつかないか: Hey... You're going to shoot me and run away?! Is it because I won't look cool if I get killed right away?
そんなつまらない戦い方！ 気に入らない！: That's a boring way to fight! I don't like it!
ふふ、逃げるのを追うより、あたしとしては追われるほうが好みなのだけれど。: Hehe, I'd rather be chased than chased away.
あはっ……この高揚感……！早く捕まえて、一緒に遊びましょう！: Aha... This feeling of exhilaration...! Let's catch him and play together!
逃げたって無駄！ただの時間稼ぎにしかならないよ！: It's no use running away! It'll only buy us more time!
……自ら位置をバラしておいて直ぐに退く？行動に一貫性がないような……: ...You want me to tell you where I am and then retreat right away? There's no consistency in my actions...
こっちのアクションから、撤退までの判断にラグがなかった……つまり、最初から退くこ: There was no lag between our actions and the decision to withdraw... In other words, she was thinking of retreating from the start and shooting at us?
ユリアの実力は、この前の偵察を通して伝わってるはず。やっぱり……何かおかしい！: Julia's power should have been conveyed through our reconnaissance the other day. I knew it... Something's wrong!
あぁ、もうめんどっちーなぁ！一気に突撃して終わらせてあげる！: Ah, geez, what a pain in the ass! I'll charge in and finish it all off in one go!
では、それを実現するための策をお前らに授ける。: Well then, I'll give you a plan to make that happen.
七彩、任せた。: I'll leave it to you, Shichika.
といっても、%usernameusernameuserna%さんと一緒になって考: That said, %usernameusernameuserna% and I came up with this plan together.
理屈としては単純です。相手が砲撃を避けるなら、避ける隙間もないほどの飽和攻撃をし: Logically speaking, it's simple. If the enemy wants to avoid a bombardment, they'll have to resort to saturation attacks that leave no openings for them to dodge.
うわっ、急にバカみたいなこと言い出した。たった５機でそんな弾幕張れるわけないじゃ: Whoa, she suddenly sounded like an idiot. How could she set up a barrage like that with just five TSFs?
そのために……次の試合ではこれを使用いたします。: To that end... I will use this in the next match.
これは……近接信管を搭載した１２０ｍｍ榴弾！？: This is... a 120mm grenade with a close-range fuse!?
榴弾って、あの着弾したら破片が広がるヤツ？: A grenade? You mean the one that gets splintered when it hits?
そうだね。かなりの広範囲に飛散する弾よ。たしかにこれをまとめて撃ち込まれたら、避: That's right. It's a bullet that scatters over a very wide area. I guess there's no way to dodge it if it's all fired at once.
でも、これって小型のメイズシフター用ですよね？いくら薄いとはいえ、ＭＧの装甲には: But this is for a small maise shifter, isn't it? Even if it's thin, it won't have any effect on MG armor...
もちろん、これだけで撃墜は不可能でしょう。ですが、足止めくらいはできますわ。: Of course, it would be impossible to shoot them down with just this. However, we can at least slow them down.
……榴弾で足止めをしてその隙に撃墜、と。: ...She said she'd stop him with a grenade and use that opportunity to shoot him down.
そのために、徹甲弾も準備しますわ。: I'll prepare armor-piercing rounds for that.
いいじゃん……！なんかやれそうな気がしてきた！: What's wrong with that...?! I'm starting to feel like I can do something!
ユリアさんの性格ならこの状況に焦れて、先陣を切って飛び込んで来るはずですわ……！: Given Julia's personality, she should be impatient with this situation and jump in first!
勝負はその一瞬！: The match lasts for that moment!
